name: Bomb Box
description:
This game was made in a 3 hour Jam. The time limit was decided by a random number generator. It was a fun game to make despite not being able to test much. The game came out perfectly though as far as I can tell. Please let me know what you think.

There is a dev-log for this game if anyone is interested, you can watch it here:

Thanks for playing, I plan on updating the game with another world sometime soon!
